titleStmt.title: Cantica Certen of the songes of HN. To a good instruction and edifyinge of the Famelie of Loue, and of all those that turne them ther-vnto. Translated out of Base-almayne.
titleStmt.author: Niclaes, Hendrik, 1502?-1580?

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
